405360.name: OMSI 2 Add-On Projekt Gladbeck
405360.description:
OMSI 2 - Project Gladbeck - The Ruhr region by bus!

Hop on and be a bus driver on more than 35 recreated bus lines through cities like Gladbeck, Bottrop, Gelsenkirchen, Essen, Recklinghausen, Marl and Dortmund! Here´s the deal: 1,000 objects and buildings on 500km of accessible route - guaranteeing more than 2,000 hours of driving fun!

A special highlight: It is the biggest map for OMSI 2 with 8 bus stations and 3 depots so far! The highest possible realism is ensured byoriginal timetables and paintworks provided by courtesy of the Vestische Straßenbahnen GmbH.

OMSI 2 - Project Gladbeck offers players more realism than the previous freeware versions! The add-on ist compatible with the Advanced Driver Omnibus.



  • More than 35 recreated bus lines of the cities Gladbeck, Bottrop, Gelsenkirchen, Essen, Recklinghausen, Marl, Dortmund
  • More than 2.000 hours driving fun
  • More than 1.000 individual objects and buildings
  • More than 500km of accessible route
  • More realism than the previous freeware versions
  • Express lines
  • Night bus lines
  • Parts of the route include the Autobahn
  • 8 bus stations
  • 3 depots
  • Original timetable data of the Vestische Straßenbahnen GmbH
  • ÖPNV-line
  • Announcements
  • Stadium traffic
  • Special service (School transport)
  • Active LIVE-Ticker App in App Store and Amazon
  • Original paintworks of the Vestische Straßenbahnen GmbH
  • Movie Park Germany
  • AI trains
  • AI trams
  • New passenger voices
  • Original tickets of the Vestische Straßenbahnen GmbH

Highlights in this version


  • More than 35 accessible bus lines
  • Striking buildings and places reconstruct realistically
  • Biggest card for OMSI 2 so far!
  • Compatible with AOD (Advanced Omnibus Driver)

List of functions and contents


  • Map with more than 35 accessible bus lines
  • C2 + C2G busses
  • Original paintworks of the Vestische Straßenbahnen GmbH
  • Rolling stock (AI tram + AI trains)
  • New passenger voices
405360.supported_languages:
英语, 德语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
